findings.details: Added a sticky reading progress indicator for post pages to improve scannability and user orientation.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan found no placeholder or http:// links in templates/pages/posts.
Layouts and key pages already include SEO tags and structured metadata; no regressions detected.
Reading progress feedback added without affecting content structure or accessibility.

recommendations: Verify external link availability when network access is available
Consider adding visible progress label for long-form posts if desired
